messageValues.message:
=You are an intelligent job filtering system for an automation engineer who builds outreach systems, CRM systems, project management systems, no-code integrations, and API integrations.
RELEVANT SKILLS & PLATFORMS:
Airtable, ClickUp, ChatGPT, Make, Monday.com, Zapier, LinkedIn, Google Sheets, N8N
API integrations (using no-code tools)
System automation and workflow optimization
NOT RELEVANT (EXCLUDE):
Full-stack app development
Python, Telegram, WhatsApp, Facebook, Bubble.io, Softr, Google Apps Scripts, chatbots
Virtual assistant work
Tiny projects (<10 minutes) or requiring same-day/24hr delivery
Jobs where the CORE work is: content writing, social media marketing, web development, SEO, graphic design, data entry, research, etc.
Jobs that only mention relevant tools incidentally (e.g., "track results in Airtable" when the main work is writing/marketing)
FILTER CRITERIA: The job must be PRIMARILY about building, configuring, automating, or optimizing systems/workflows. Simply using tools like Airtable or ClickUp as storage/tracking doesn't qualify - the work itself must focus on system architecture, automation, integrations, or process optimization.
EXAMPLE RELEVANT PROJECTS:
Zapier automation hub connecting 12 tools for e-commerce business doing $5M/yr
Airtable inventory management system for manufacturing company with 500+ SKUs
Make.com workflow automating lead qualification for $2M/yr consulting firm
ClickUp operations dashboard for multi-location restaurant chain (15 locations)
LinkedIn outreach automation generating 200+ qualified leads/month for SaaS startup
Google Sheets to Monday.com migration for construction company managing $10M projects
Multi-platform CRM integration syncing data across Airtable, ClickUp, and HubSpot
Automated reporting system pulling data from 8 sources for $3M/yr agency
OUTPUT FORMAT:
{
  "result": "true/false",
  "reason": "Brief explanation of why it matches or doesn't match",
  "icebreaker": "Short, confident intro message if relevant (empty string if not relevant)"
}

ICEBREAKER GUIDELINES (for relevant jobs only):
Start with "Confident I'm the man you're looking for"
Reference specific relevant experience from the example projects above that matches their need
Match the platform/tool they need with similar work (e.g., Airtable job → reference Airtable inventory project, Monday.com job → reference Google Sheets to Monday migration, etc.)
Mention scale/results when possible (e.g., "$5M/yr business", "500+ SKUs", "200+ leads/month")
Keep it concise but demonstrate deep familiarity with their specific platform/challenge
Example: "Confident I'm the man you're looking for. I built an Airtable inventory management system for a manufacturing company with 500+ SKUs, including custom interfaces and automated workflows."

json.title: Virtual Sales Assistant for Lead Generation, Outreach Experiments & Sales Support (B2B SaaS)
json.description_text:
We’re a fast-growing SaaS company that helps businesses on Microsoft 365 streamline project management and automation. We’re looking for a highly motivated virtual assistant with a proven track record in B2B lead generation who can also support sales experimentation, case study creation, and light sales material development.


Key Responsibilities:
	•	Research and build outbound lead lists (law firms, construction firms, IT providers, etc.)
	•	Launch and manage cold outreach campaigns using Apollo and Instantly.com
	•	Write short, personalized intros based on company and role
	•	Run outbound experiments to test different offers, messages, and personas
	•	Track results and recommend iterations (subject lines, CTAs, timing, etc.)
	•	Use our platform (Trovve) to track outreach, leads, and meetings
	•	Assist in creating case studies from customer feedback and results
	•	Build or refine simple sales presentations or one-pagers for specific verticals


Requirements:
	•	Proven experience in outbound lead generation with measurable results
	•	Skilled with tools like Apollo, Instantly.com, and LinkedIn Sales Navigator
	•	Strong written English (especially for light personalization and marketing collateral)
	•	Comfortable running outbound experiments and reporting on performance
	•	Bonus: Experience creating simple sales decks or client-facing materials
	•	Self-directed, resourceful, and outcome-oriented
	•	SaaS or Microsoft 365 ecosystem experience is a plus


Tools We Use:
	•	Apollo
	•	Instantly.com
	•	LinkedIn Sales Navigator
	•	Trovve (our internal PM & CRM system)
	•	Microsoft 365 (Outlook, Excel, PowerPoint)

json.title: Data Engineer to Deploy Airflow on Snowflake's Snowpark Container Services (SPCS) + Github CI/CD
json.description_text:
We are looking for an experienced DevOps/Data Platform engineer to architect and build a modern, cost-effective Apache Airflow instance running entirely on Snowflake's Snowpark Container Services (SPCS). The goal is to create a robust, automated orchestration platform for our DAGs, which primarily consist of lightweight API calls and simple data connections. This project will be built from a single mono-repository in GitHub, which will house both the Airflow application infrastructure code and our DAGs. The final solution must be automated, secure, and optimized for low operational cost.

Scope of Work & Core Requirements:

1. All-in-One Repository: Design and create a custom repo for a single-node, all-in-one Airflow deployment. This repo will include both container build info and airflow DAG code.

2. CI/CD Automation with GitHub Actions: Develop a full CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions that triggers deployments. 

3. Real-time DAG Deployment: Configure the SPCS service specification to include a `git-sync` sidecar container. This sidecar must continuously monitor our GitHub mono-repository and sync the `dags/` folder to a shared volume, allowing for near-instantaneous DAG updates without requiring a full application redeployment.

4. Secure Credential Management: Implement a robust security model using Snowflake Secrets for all runtime credentials (e.g., API keys, service passwords). Configure the SPCS service specification to securely mount these Snowflake Secrets into the Airflow container as environment variables at runtime. 

Required Skills and Experience:

 We require expert-level skill in Apache Airflow, including creating custom Docker images and managing its core components, as well as expert-level skill in GitHub Actions for building complex CI/CD pipelines. Strong proficiency in Docker is needed, including multi-stage builds and optimization. It is crucial that you have a deep understanding of secure credential management, specifically the distinction and implementation of Snowflake Secrets and GitHub Actions Secrets. Experience with the `git-sync` sidecar pattern for continuous deployment and setting up a mono-repo structure for a DevOps-focused project is essential.

Deliverables:

1. A fully functional GitHub mono-repository containing all necessary code (Dockerfile, `supervisord.conf`, `service-spec.yaml`, GitHub Actions workflows).
2. A deployed and running Airflow service on our SPCS compute pool.
3. A working CI/CD pipeline that automates the build and deployment process.
4. Clear documentation on how the system works and how to manage it.

To Apply:

In your proposal, please briefly describe a similar project you have completed. Specifically highlight your experience with building and deploying airflow with containers.

json.title: Automation & Workflow Integration Specialist for Real Estate
json.description_text:
We’re a fast-moving real estate investment company looking for a skilled automation specialist to build, optimize, and maintain smart workflows across our tech stack. You should have real-world experience connecting platforms like HelloSign, CRMs, dialers, and Google Sheets using n8n, Make.com, or Zapier., Salesforce, Justcall, Gmail flows wetc.

Our goal is to reduce manual work, increase data accuracy, and streamline internal operations. If you're an integration wizard who thrives in building back-end automations and knows how to think like an operator, we want to work with you.

Responsibilities:

Build multi-step workflows triggered by events (e.g. document signed in HelloSign → parse data → send to CRM → notify title company)

Automate CRM field updates using contract data (e.g. pull price from PDF and update lead record)

Create time-based automations (e.g. update lead stage every 48 hours if not contacted)

Integrate phone systems or smart dialers with CRM and lead pipelines

Ensure workflows are error-proof, trackable, and easily maintainable

Build automation documentation for internal reference

Must-Have Skills:

Expertise with n8n, Make.com, or Zapier

Strong understanding of APIs, webhooks, and parsing structured data (e.g. JSON, PDFs)

Experience integrating tools like HelloSign, Google Sheets, CRMs, Twilio/RingCentral, etc.

Attention to detail, clear documentation, and ability to think operationally

English fluency and ability to communicate over async (Slack/email) + video calls

Nice to Have (Bonus Points):

Familiarity with real estate workflows

Experience automating lead follow-up or sales pipelines

Knowledge of ChatGPT API or embedding AI into workflows

Understanding of dialer platforms and SMS follow-up tools

json.title: 🔧 Automation , AI Marketing Expert and virtual assistant
json.description_text:
🚀 Automation & Marketing Workflow Expert (Zapier, Make, AI Voice Agent, CRM, ClickUp, Shopify)

We’re looking for a freelance expert to help us automate and optimize our sales, marketing, and operations processes using Zapier, Make (formerly Integromat), and other modern tools.

✅ Scope of Work

🔗 Tool Integrations & Automations

Connect tools like Go HighLevel (GHL), Shopify, Google Sheets, QuickBooks, and others to automate lead management, tagging, email marketing, reporting, and invoicing.

🗂️ ClickUp Automation

Create task automations triggered by CRM activity, form submissions, or deal status changes.

📧 Email & SMS Marketing Setup

Build smart flows in Go HighLevel for customer journeys, lead nurturing, and notifications.

📊 KPI Dashboard Setup

Use Google Sheets/Analytics to build custom reports tracking sales and marketing performance.

🤖 AI Voice Agent (Inbound & Outbound)

Implement and integrate an AI-powered voice agent (using platforms like Air.ai, Vapi, or similar) to handle inbound calls (FAQs, appointment booking, customer inquiries) and outbound calls (follow-ups, lead qualification, surveys).

Connect the voice agent to CRM and marketing systems to tag, score, and update leads based on call interactions.

✍️ AI-Powered Efficiency

Use tools like ChatGPT or Jasper to generate email content, sales responses, or chatbot flows.

📈 Facebook Pixel Setup

Install and verify Facebook Pixel to track conversions and performance for ad campaigns.

🛠️ Tools We Use:
Zapier, Make, Go HighLevel, ClickUp, Shopify, Google Sheets, QuickBooks, Google Analytics, ChatGPT, Slack.

💡 What We’re Looking For:
✅ Strong Zapier or Make experience with CRM, marketing, and finance tools
✅ Ability to build efficient task workflows in ClickUp
✅ Familiarity with AI Voice Agent implementation for inbound/outbound calls
✅ Understanding of email/SMS flows and customer journeys
✅ Knowledge of AI tools (ChatGPT, Jasper) and their practical use in sales & marketing
✅ Bonus: Experience with Facebook Pixel and Shopify integrations

📩 To Apply:
Please share:

Relevant automation examples

Your experience with AI Voice Agents or similar voice automation tools

Your hourly or fixed project rate

Any dashboards or flows you’ve built before

json.title: ChatGPT + Twilio Integration Expert Needed to Automate Driver Stats Texting System
json.description_text: We are seeking a skilled developer to integrate ChatGPT with Twilio for an automated driver statistics texting system. The ideal candidate will design a solution that allows our drivers to receive real-time updates on their performance metrics via SMS. This project requires a solid understanding of both APIs and experience in automation. If you are passionate about leveraging AI to enhance communication, we want to hear from you!

json.title: Social Media Marketer creation and management for our company owned brands
json.description_text: We are seeking an experienced social media marketer to manage and execute various campaigns for our company. The ideal candidate will develop engaging content, analyze performance metrics, and optimize strategies across multiple platforms. The role requires creativity and a strong understanding of social media trends to effectively connect with our target audience. If you have a proven track record of successful campaigns and a passion for digital marketing, we'd love to hear from you!

json.title: Google sheet to html doc using make or other
json.description_text:
I have a google sheet where that I am populating data to produce the contents for an html page. Looking for someone to setup the process of populating this page in a make automation. 

Must have experience doing this

json.title: AI Agents | n8n Automation Expert | Notion Expert | Automation Expert
json.description_text:
Description:
We're looking for a highly experienced AI Automation Specialist who is a true expert in building intelligent workflows using n8n, Notion, and AI agents (e.g., OpenAI, Langchain, RAG pipelines, custom bots, etc.). This role is ideal for someone who thrives on streamlining operations and integrating tools to save time, reduce manual effort, and boost productivity.

Who We Are:
We are a fast-growing business that leverages smart automation to stay ahead. We work across platforms like Airtable, Notion, CRMs, and various APIs — and we're now expanding our automation infrastructure. You’ll work directly with our founder on high-impact tasks.

🔧 Your Core Responsibilities:
Design, build, and maintain n8n workflows integrated with APIs, webhooks, and external tools

Develop and deploy AI agents for customer support, internal knowledge queries, or operational automation

Seamlessly integrate and automate workflows across Notion, Airtable, Slack, Gmail, HubSpot, and more

Create modular, reusable workflows that are easy to scale and manage

Document your logic, approach, and offer support during testing and deployment

✅ Required Expertise:
Proven experience with n8n automation (please share past workflows or repos)

Advanced Notion automation knowledge using APIs and integrations

Experience with AI agents (OpenAI APIs, Langchain, RAG architecture, or similar)

Solid understanding of API endpoints, webhooks, and JSON payloads

Ability to think strategically and offer suggestions to improve business automation

Excellent communication and documentation skills

💡 Bonus if you have:
Experience with Zapier, Make.com, or Retool

Airtable automations or scripting

AI chatbot deployment (e.g., internal team assistants or customer bots)

Please apply only if you're an expert.
When applying, mention "n8n Ninja" in your proposal and provide examples of past work (screenshots, videos, or brief descriptions of automations you've built).

Let’s build something powerful together.

json.title: Set up Voice AI on GoHighLevel
json.description_text:
I’m looking for an expert who has experience working with Voice AI inside of GoHighLevel to help me set up an AI voice agent that can book appointments for my business.

I want to learn how to set this up correctly — not just have it done for me. So I need someone who can:

(The caller does not need to be perfect, im mainly looking to learn how to make it collect name & type of appointment and map it in the right fields. So the job is not long, it will take a couple of minutes only.)

✅ Set up the AI voice agent to:

Collect the caller’s name

Collect what type of appointment the caller is trying to book

Map this data into the Opportunities section so I can clearly see:

Name of the person who booked

Type of appointment they booked

✅ Teach me how to do this:

Set it up once (while recording the process in a Loom video)

Write clear step-by-step instructions so I can repeat the process in the future

I want to get this done ASAP — ready to hire immediately.

Budget for this first task is $150 for teaching me and delivering the video + written instructions.

If you do a good job, I will have more ongoing tasks related to voice AI and GoHighLevel setup in the future.

Please only apply if you have direct experience with Voice AI inside of GoHighLevel and can confidently teach this.

json.title: AI Video Character Developer – Custom Avatar Creation & Automation Pipeline
json.description_text:
AI Video Character Developer – Custom Avatar Creation 

Project Overview
We are building a scalable video production system that integrates custom characters with automated scripting and voiceover tools. We’re seeking an experienced AI video specialist to help create original character avatars and integrate them into a robust automation workflow.

This project will begin with a batch of 6 characters and, upon successful delivery, scale up significantly. Ideal candidates will have strong experience in AI character design, video automation, OpenAI integrations, and API workflows.

🔧 Key Responsibilities
Custom Character Creation: Design original AI avatars from briefs and visual references (not stock models)

Voice Sync & Expression: Enable accurate lip-syncing and natural facial movement with AI-generated voiceovers

Script-to-Video Pipeline: Develop a system that transforms scripts into polished video content using automation

OpenAI Integration: Build prompt-based scripting flows using OpenAI or similar LLMs

API Workflow: Create endpoints and automation logic to generate videos programmatically

Style Flexibility: Support both photorealistic and stylised/animated visual styles

Scalability: Develop processes that support rapid expansion (50+ characters)

🧠 Technical Requirements
Familiarity with tools like Runway, D-ID, HeyGen, Synthesia, or similar platforms

Experience with voice cloning and text-to-speech integration (e.g., ElevenLabs, XTTS)

Strong grasp of automation workflows (e.g., via Python, Node.js, or serverless functions)

Ability to build, test, and document custom API endpoints

OpenAI API experience for text generation and prompt design

Video output generation at scale, ideally with cloud-based processing experience

📁 Deliverables (Phase 1)
6 original AI avatars (designed and developed)

Script-to-video pipeline fully functional via API

Documentation: endpoints, automation logic, sample flows

Test videos demonstrating emotional expression, voice sync, and character clarity

Clean handover of assets with appropriate licensing clearance

🔐 IP & Ownership
All deliverables must be created exclusively for this project

Final ownership and full commercial rights are transferred to us upon completion

No reuse of characters, models, code, or training data is permitted elsewhere

IP agreement and rights confirmation required upon selection

👤 Ideal Candidate Profile
Must Have:

2+ years experience with AI avatar/video generation tools

Portfolio of custom avatar work (not pre-made templates)

OpenAI API or similar integration experience

Experience with automated video generation workflows

Understanding of lip-sync/emotion tech

Preferred:

Background in animation, 3D, or character design

Familiarity with webhooks and automation platforms (Zapier, Make, etc.)

Experience managing batch content production or video pipelines

💼 Project Scope & Terms
Phase 1: Develop 6 characters and a working automation pipeline

Phase 2: Expand character library and optimize system for scale

Timeline: ~4–6 weeks for initial delivery

Budget: Competitive, depending on experience and scope

Engagement: Long-term potential for ongoing character development

📝 To Apply
Please provide:

Portfolio of original AI characters or relevant projects

Your preferred tools and approach to automated video generation

Confirmation of ability to transfer full IP ownership

Sample API/video automation flow (if available)

Your proposed timeline and pricing structure

json.title: Discord Trading Signal Bot Development
json.description_text:
Discord Bot to Read Trade Signals and Place Orders on Apex (Rithmic), NinjaTrader, Thinkorswim

I’m looking for a developer to build a custom Discord trading assistant bot.
Phase 1 :
A Windows-compatible .exe bot (with eventual deployment on AWS) that:
Monitors text messages in a specific Discord channel
Parses futures trade signals (e.g., “BUY GC @ 2345 STOP 2335 TP 2365”) – format may vary
Sends me an alert via Discord with the parsed trade and asks for manual approval (with adjustable risk size)
Once confirmed, executes a bracket order (entry, stop loss, take profit)
Supports Apex (Rithmic), NinjaTrader, and ThinkOrSwim (Schwab) (other platforms optional later)
Implements risk-based position sizing (fixed $ or %)
Ignores signals for instruments already in an open trade
Responds to mid-trade messages like “move to breakeven” or “exit early”
Sends Discord alerts when a trade is executed or fails
Logs actions, errors, and trade metadata to a local file
Reads config from settings.json

Phase 2:
Parse trades from images (signals are image-based and more consistent)

Run on an AWS VPS or containerized deployment
Add GUI or web dashboard (optional)

Deliverables:
.exe file
Full source code
Setup instructions
API key config file (settings.json)
Readable code documentation
Required Skills:
Python or Node.js with Discord bot experience
Apex Prop firm other Proprietary trading firms
NinjaTrader / Rithmic API familiarity
TD Ameritrade / ThinkOrSwim API
Experience with trading automation
AWS deployment experience (optional but preferred)
OCR experience (bonus for Phase 2)

Milestones:
Phase 1 – Apex/NinjaTrader support via text signals and ThinkOrSwim

Logging, Discord alerts

Final delivery + docs

Optional Phase 2: Image parsing, AWS deployment

Budget & Timeline:
Open to hourly or milestone-based proposals

Looking to start ASAP

json.title: Marketing Strategy for Portal and Email Signups
json.description_text: We are seeking a creative marketing strategist to provide suggestions for increasing portal and email signups on our platform, CDR.fyi. The ideal candidate will analyze our current signup processes and propose actionable strategies to enhance user engagement and conversion rates. Your insights will play a crucial role in driving our user growth. Please include previous experience and examples of successful campaigns in your application.

json.title: Entry Data From PDF
json.description_text:
Summary
We are looking for a reliable and detail-oriented freelancer to manually extract data from a 195-page PDF construction price list and enter it into a structured CSV file.
Each row in the CSV must include:
• A code (e.g. A 1.01.3.a.1)
• A clean description
• Unit of measurement
• Price (decimal format)
The code has a hierarchical structure that must be preserved by splitting it into subfields (category, subcategory, etc.).
The job requires precision and consistency. No OCR or automation — manual entry only.
